Privacy Policy ("Privacy")
 Last updated: October 29, 2017 

 Please read this privacy policy carefully before using Mindlevel (the "Service") operated by Mindlevel ("us", "we", or "our"). 

 Accounts
 Your account password is hashed and salted with bcrypt which makes it impossible for any service provider or administrator to reverse what the password. Your email will never be shared with a third party and can not be accessed by other users of the service. Your identity is as protected as you choose yourself since only a username and password is needed to use the service. 

 Content
 You own the pictures that you upload, however anybody is allowed to share your uploaded pictures (without making profit of them) on for example social media. If you want a picture taken down, please email me@lukas.fyi
